feature.label: Andl Relational Algebra
feature.description:
The Andl Extended Relational Algebra as a set of Knime nodes.
The basic set includes Select, Project, Join, Rename, Union and Negation. The extensions include computing New Values and performing Aggregation.
This node set can express a full range of queries comparable to SQL on Knime data tables from any source.
